mapper.select: SELECT U.username, U.user_name, U.user_email, U.user_phone, I.image_path FROM user U LEFT JOIN image I ON U.username = I.username AND I.state = 0 WHERE U.username = #{username}

SELECT word_num, word_level, word_meaning, word_content, word_chinese, word_week, 'true' as word_favorite FROM word where word_num in (SELECT word_num FROM favorites where username = #{username} ORDER BY favorite_regdate)
SELECT record_num, record_level, record_date, record_point, record_kind FROM record WHERE username = #{username} and state = 0 ORDER BY record_num DESC

SELECT R.rd_num, R.record_num, R.username, R.word_num, R.rd_check, R.Record_value, W.word_level, W.word_meaning, W.word_content FROM record_detail R JOIN word W ON R.word_num = W.word_num WHERE username = #{username} AND record_num = #{recordNum} ORDER BY rd_num
mapper.update: update user set state = 1 where username = #{username} AND state = 0
update record set state = 1 where record_num = #{recordNum} AND state = 0
mapper.select: select word_num, word_level, word_meaning, word_content, word_chinese, word_week, 'true' as word_favorite from word where word_week = #{wordWeek} order by rand()
select distinct word_week from word order by word_week asc
mapper.update: UPDATE image SET state = 1 WHERE image_type = 'user-profile' AND username = #{username} AND state = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO image (image_path, image_type, username, created_at, created_by) VALUES (#{fileName}, 'user-profile', #{username}, now(), 'admin')
